mapper.select: SELECT jf.job_fair_id, jf.title, jf.location, jf.start_time, jf.end_time FROM tb_job_fair jf ORDER BY jf.start_time DESC
SELECT c.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_intro, jfc.booth_location FROM tb_job_fair_company jfc JOIN tb_company_info c ON jfc.company_id = c.company_id WHERE jfc.job_fair_id = #{job_fair_id}
SELECT job_fair_id AS jobFairId, title, location, booth_total AS boothTotal FROM tb_job_fair ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT booth_location FROM tb_job_fair_company WHERE job_fair_id = #{jobFairId} AND status = 1
SELECT booth_total FROM tb_job_fair WHERE job_fair_id = #{jobFairId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_job_fair_company WHERE job_fair_id = #{jobFairId} AND status = 1

SELECT jf.job_fair_id AS jobFairId, jf.title, jf.location, jf.booth_total AS boothTotal FROM tb_job_fair jf WHERE jf.job_fair_id NOT IN ( SELECT job_fair_id FROM tb_job_fair_company WHERE company_id = #{companyId} )

SELECT jf.job_fair_id AS jobFairId, jf.title, jf.location, jfc.booth_location AS boothLocation, jfc.status FROM tb_job_fair_company jfc JOIN tb_job_fair jf ON jfc.job_fair_id = jf.job_fair_id WHERE jfc.company_id = #{companyId}
